name: Cropocalypse
description:
Cropocalypse is a fast paced action survival game! Fight zombies and work on your farm to upgrade your defenses!


Description

Cropocalypse is a fast-paced action game where you play as a farmer trying to defend your crops from a zombie invasion. Use your trusty shotgun to blast away the undead and protect your farm at all costs!

Features
  • Intense zombie-killing action
  • Upgrade your weapons and equipment to improve your chances of survival
  • Plant and harvest crops to earn money and buy more powerful weapons
  • "Harvest or be Harvested"
